main event: Four military men were being briefed on the ground when they noticed two reddish-bronze objects hovering, pacing, descending, and ascending for about 3 minutes before disappearing.
interesting points: The objects were described as 'reddish-bronze' in color.
The objects were pacing, descending, and ascending.
The sighting was reported to have taken place in the presence of several military personnel.
The report suggests the sighting may have been of pilot flash bombs from night photo training exercises in the area.
The witness was an experienced artist who made a detailed pastel drawing of the object after the sighting.
result: Possibly identified as pilot flash bombs from nearby military training exercises.
photographs: Yes, the report indicates photographs were taken
